description: Italy quarantines whole towns, closes schools and cancels sports fixtures as infections increase.
title: Coronavirus: Venice Carnival closes as Italy imposes lockdown
title_page: Coronavirus: Venice Carnival closes as Italy imposes lockdown - BBC News
maintext: One of the region's leading jewellery stores still had 50 hopeful staff sitting at their counters. A couple of them told me how worried they were about this virus spreading, mostly for their elderly parents or young children. They don't have the hospital director's confidence that this will be under control soon.
